items.sentence: You must bear in mind what I've just said to you.
My favorite pastime is strolling along the shore.
The reason I went to Boston was to buy this book.
Security guards escorted Tom out of the building.
The police were questioning Tom in the next room.
Tom is planning to stay in Boston for a few days.
Tom thought Mary wouldn't likely know what to do.
Tom promised to come, but he hasn't shown up yet.
A dead body was found in woods behind the school.
Tom ran to catch up with Mary as she walked home.
